title: Sejuani W Damage
body: Sejuanis W deals 12% of enemy max hp, aoe on her auto attack. currently most max hp spells have a cap to monsters, {{champion:67}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:254}}etc etc, SEJ DOESNT

replies.body: You could stop being stupid and realise that it is 12 %of ***her*** hp as damage, to promote tanky sejuani builds.
she can nuke baron like crazy, plus it has an ap scaling

i can tell its a bait/troll thread. but compare rate of use of those spells or their total % damage output from full duration (in the case of malz puddle) and you can easily tell the difference between a reasonably long CD % HP damage spell compared to 2 AS scaling % damage abilities and a long duration puddle.

there are others with % damage spells that dont have caps.
